author: greenrd
msg: correction on the usage of util:include-expr

author: bloritsch
msg: Updated AvalonApi, removed all "public" scopes from interfaces--it is semantically
incorrect.  Fixed SecurityException reporting in RepositoryClassLoader.

author: bloritsch
msg: All inteface methods/attributes are implicitly public.  Any time they are explicitly stated,
it is semantically incorrect--and a good compiler will reject it as an error.
